osi_layer.name: Application
osi_layer.function: Protocols for resource sharing or remote file execution

osi_layer.name: Presentation
osi_layer.function: Translation of data between a networking service and appalication character encoding, data compression, encrypt/decryption

osi_layer.name: Session
osi_layer.function: Establish, manage and terminate session, API, sockets, Authentication, Authorization and session managment.

osi_layer.name: Transport
osi_layer.function: Reliabale connection oritented/less transmission of data segments/datagram between points on a network.

osi_layer.name: Data link
osi_layer.function: Transmission of data frames between two nodes connected by a physical layer.

osi_layer.name: Physical
osi_layer.function: Transmisson and reception of raw bit stream over a physikal medium.
